company.description: Basic information about the company which executes the process defined in the process definition document

id.description: A unique identifier for the company

processSummary.description: A systematic, repeatable set of activities or tasks, performed in a specific sequence, to achieve a specific organizational goal or business outcome

id.description: A unique identifier for the process

department.description: The group within the business which executes the process

asOfDate.description: The specific point in time used to indicate that the process is current and accurate as of that date

employeeProfile.description: Information about the employee or employees who execute the process on behalf of the customer

averageWorkingDaysPerYear.description: The average number of days a single employee works per year. This number excludes off days, paid time off, and any other company-observed holidays

workingHoursPerDay.description: The legal number of hours an employee works per day. The number is defined in legislation for the country or a work contract between the company and employee.

averageEmployeeFullCostPerYear.description: The cost of an employee including salary and other benefits.

processVolumetry.description: Information about how often a process is executed, and how much data is processed during the process execution

frequency.description: How often the process is executed.
frequency.$comment: Numerical values of each valid value. hourly = WORKING_DAYS * WORKING_HOURS,daily = WORKING_DAYS; weekly = 52, bi-weekly = 26, monthly = 12, quarterly = 4, yearly = 1
frequency.anyOf: daily, weekly, bi-weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly

averageActivityVolume.description: The average number of incoming documents, files, requests, or transactions executed

averageActivityVolumePer.description: The average number of incoming documents, files, requests, or transactions executed per employee or company
averageActivityVolumePer.$comment: Numerical values of each valid value. company = 0, employee = 1

numberOfEmployeesExecuting.description: The number of employees currently executing the task or process

averageProcessingTime.description: The average amount of time, in minutes, it takes to process a single task or transaction

averageErrorRate.description: The average percentage of error occurances in the total volume of transactions

averageReworkTime.description: The average amount of time, in minutes, it takes to rework a task or transaction that had an error

totalReworkTime.title: Calculated total rework time at the level of the company

averageAudit.description: The average percentage of completed tasks or transactions that are audited

averageAuditTime.description: Average review or audit time per transaction

asIsProcess.description: The current, existing way a business process operates, serving as a baseline for analysis and improvement by detailing the process's steps, stakeholders, systems, and documentation in its present state before any changes are made. It provides a comprehensive, step-by-step view of how work is done now, highlighting inefficiencies and opportunities for optimization in preparation for designing a future, 'to-be' process
asIsProcess.$comment: Purpose of the As-Is Process Section, Baseline for Improvement: It establishes the 'now' state, providing a clear starting point to understand the scope and nature of the changes needed for improvement.; Stakeholder Alignment: Documenting the current process helps ensure everyone involved understands how things are done, reducing confusion and creating a shared understanding.; Identification of Opportunities: By mapping the current state, potential areas for optimization, efficiency gains, and resource allocation are revealed.; Support for To-Be Process Design: The insights gathered from the as-is analysis are crucial for designing a more effective and streamlined 'to-be' (future state) process.; Training and Onboarding: It can serve as a valuable resource for new hires or team members to quickly understand the existing workflow and how to execute their tasks.

detailedProcessSteps.description: Detailed step-by-step actions taken by any person who needs to execute the process.

stepNumber.description: The number that identifies the step's order in relative to other steps.

stepDescription.description: A detailed description of the step which can be used to execute the step even by someone who has never executed the process before.

stepNumber.description: Refers to a step number in DETAILED_PROCESS_STEPS

isNativelyDigital.description: Describes whether the input has a natively digital source or not.

isDigitized.description: Describes whether the input is digitized from a non-digital source or not.

isStructured.description: Describes whether the input is structured or not

applicationName.description: The application's full name as given by the publisher

commonName.description: A common or short name often used in place of the APPLICATION_NAME

version.description: The publisher's version of the application.

licenseInfo.description: Information on how the application is licensed

permission.description: A description of the permission, i.e. an AD Group, an authorization in the application, a claim, etc.

currency.description: The currency code used throughout the document when describing dollar amounts.

hourlyRate.description: The amount of money a single person makes per hour to execute the process

salary.description: The amount of money a single person per year to execute the process
